message: The problem, of course, is that I don't even know where to start.
I figure my best shot is to head to the place he met up with that woman yesterday.

As always, the main street is a slice of paradise窶病n artificial atmosphere of joy covers everything.

I make my way through it, acutely aware that I'll never feel comfortable here.
I head down a side street and come out in front of the building from before. I don't see anyone that looks like Koujaku outside.
Is he inside, or is he just not here?

name: 蒼葉
message: "Where is he..."
He hasn't responded to my message, so my only option is to search blindly around town.
Speaking of which, he told me not to come here again, didn't he? I wonder what he meant by that.
As I'm staring at the building, considering my options, someone taps me on the shoulder.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Oh!"

name: 竜峰
message: "We meet again."
I turn to see the man from yesterday. He narrows his fox-like eyes and smiles.

name: 蒼葉
message: "H-Hey."

name: 竜峰
message: "Did you have fun yesterday?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah, I guess you could say that."

name: 竜峰
message: "Well, that's just wonderful. What's wrong this time? You should have no trouble getting in with the card I gave you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm not trying to get in today. I'm looking for someone."

name: 竜峰
message: "A friend?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Something like that."

name: 竜峰
message: "I see. Would you mind if I lent a hand?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh? Oh. I couldn't ask you to do that."

name: 竜峰
message: "Don't worry. I'm not offering to search the town. Just tell me what they look like."

name: 竜峰
message: "My schedules not completely open, but I could at least keep an eye out."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No, I mean―"

name: 竜峰
message: "Well, I won't force you if you don't want to say. So wipe that glum look off your face."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry."

name: 竜峰
message: "No need to apologize. ...Heh, you're such a boy scout. I like guys like you. Color me intrigued."

name: 竜峰
message: "You oughta be careful, though. You seem like a trusting sort. But one wrong move and chomp! The person you trusted might turn around and bite you."

name: 竜峰
message: "They might just gobble you up. Dig?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Uh-huh."
The man's expression suddenly turns serious.
I start to turn to see what got his attention, but then his smile reappears.

name: 竜峰
message: "...Well, I should be getting inside. Best of luck finding your friend."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thanks."

name: 竜峰
message: "Until next time."
The man heads to the door, seeming to glide as he walks.
His steps hardly make a sound. That must be how rich people walk.
Koujaku's walk is the opposite―long gruff strides.
I watch the man vanish into the club. Come to think of it, we were talking about him when Koujaku warned me away from the place.
Something about my description of the man seemed to strike a nerve...

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba."
Ren pokes his head out of my bag.

name: 蒼葉
message: "What's up?"

name: 蓮
message: "Beni was in the vicinity recently."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?!"

name: 蓮
message: "I could hear the distinct sound of his wings."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Which means Koujaku is nearby too."

name: 蓮
message: "I would assume so."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Let's find them."
They might still be in the area.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku... What the hell are you doing?!"
It's like we're playing tag or something!
With growing annoyance, I retrace my steps back into the alley.
